name: Chrome Reactive Inspector
description: This extension enables developers to debug reactive web applications written in Rx.js 5 or Bacon.js. It adds a new panel to the Chrome DevTools that interacts with the inspected page.
author: David Richter, Ragnar Mogk; based on work by Waqas Abbas, Pradeep Baradur and Benedikt Gross with supervision from Prof. Guido Salvaneschi at TU-Darmstadt
